Author: doubleflipheart
Text: If you eat what she eats you will lose weight if she's eating at her maintenance calories. I always eat the number of calories I would need to maintain my goal weight.

Author: technicol0r
Text: I feel this. I’m also short (5’0”) and while I don’t compare myself to taller people so much, but I feel like literally every other girl my height I see has a tiny, thin, delicate bone structure that I’ll never get no matter how much I lose.
